text: Holly Ridge is an unincorporated community in Richland Parish, Louisiana, United States. ==History== In 1908 the Chess and Wymond company purchased over 6000 acres in the area now known as Holly Ridge. They named the site after the thousands of Holly trees growing along the hilltops. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Richland Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Holly Ridge, Louisiana
